alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Corson; Dewey; McPherson; Walworth (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 24 at 1:12PM MST until December 26 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON CST /11 AM MST/ MONDAY TO 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Corson, Campbell, McPherson, Walworth and Dewey Counties. * WHEN...From noon CST /11 AM MST/ Monday to 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
